name: Oh, No! I'm Gonna Be Late For Dinner!
name_original: Oh, No! I'm Gonna Be Late For Dinner!
description:
Controls: Arrow Keys to move, Space to Dash/Attack/Roll!

The full moon is out and Samir got out of class late! Help them hurry home so that their mom doesn't lecture them about letting the dinner get cold!!

If Samir gets hurt by the bullies on the way, they will turn into a werewolf quicker, but be careful about attacking them: the lust for blood may make them lose control too!

Each Die represents a stage of Samir's transformation, from a d12 to a d4. The closer to the d4, the closer to losing control, so be aware of the risks: rolling a one on any die as you attack will bring you one die down. But don't worry, there is also a chance of getting your die back by rolling the highest number on the die!

This is Nihilo Games' submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, made from scratch in 48h! Art is by Jaya Gratts (@ghostlysleuth) and Code is by Hadrien Nguyen. Follow our twitter for upcoming projects @Nihilo_Games .
